method.name: displayStyle
method.comment: Set a DDM template ID that starts with the prefix "ddmTemplate_" (i.e. ddmTemplate_06cd7b42-e8a4-4b5e-8d5a-b4f4dbba5618) to use as the display style.

method.name: enableCommentRatings
method.comment: Set this to true to enable ratings in Wiki comments.

method.name: enableComments
method.comment: Set this to true to enable comments for Wiki pages.

method.name: enablePageRatings
method.comment: Set this to true to enable ratings for Wiki pages.

method.name: addMultipleFileEntries
method.comment: TODO: Remove. This should extend from EditFileEntryAction once it is modularized.

method.name: getAddMultipleFileEntriesErrorMessage
method.comment: TODO: Remove. This should extend from EditFileEntryAction once it is modularized.

method.name: getAllowedFileExtensions
method.comment: TODO: Remove. This should extend from EditFileEntryAction once it is modularized.

method.comment: TODO: Remove. This should extend from EditFileEntryAction once it is modularized.
